This durable car awning provides ample shade and shelter for your outdoor adventures. Crafted with a robust aluminum alloy frame and waterproof material, it's designed to withstand the elements while offering you a comfortable haven during camping trips or other recreational activities.

  • Aluminum Alloy Frame: Provides exceptional strength and durability for lasting performance
  • Waterproof Material: Keeps you dry and protected from rain and moisture
  • 2.5M x 2M Dimensions: Offers ample coverage for a comfortable space

The awning boasts a generous 2.5-meter by 2-meter size, providing plenty of room for relaxation and activities. The lightweight yet sturdy aluminum alloy frame ensures stability and ease of setup.

This car awning offers numerous benefits for outdoor enthusiasts:

  • Protection from the Elements: The waterproof material effectively shields you from rain, sun, and wind
  • Spacious Shelter: The ample 2.5M x 2M dimensions create a comfortable space for relaxation, dining, or even sleeping
  • Easy Setup: The durable aluminum alloy frame is designed for quick and simple assembly

This versatile car awning is perfect for a wide range of outdoor activities:

  • Camping trips
  • Picnics
  • Beach days
  • Tailgating events
  • Outdoor gatherings

Its compact size and lightweight design make it easy to transport and set up in various locations.
